title: 108_hr1791
content: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to authorize a qualified S corporation to make a one-time corporate conversion under special tax treatment which shall: (1) in the case of a transfer to partnership form result in no shareholder gain or loss recognition on transferred money or property. And (2) treat other money or property transfers as payment for such corporation's stock. Requires the partnership to maintain a five-year continuity of business in order to avoid a conversion recapture tax.
